title: Emerald and Diamond Floral Haaram with South Sea Pearl Drop
materials: Finely crafted in 18K Yellow Gold (35.780 grams)
and a lustrous South Sea pearl (4.67 carats). The setting ensures maximum sparkle and security.
features: This Haaram features a central floral motif meticulously encrusted with diamonds. The delicate emerald accents along the neckline and in the central pendant enhance the necklace's allure. Dangling diamond "drops" provide subtle movement and captivating shimmer. Features Hyderabadi polish for extra luster.
colors: The piece showcases a harmonious blend of golden yellow
complemented by the creamy ivory hue of the South Sea pearl. A classically elegant combination.
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. Also suitable for modern celebratory events. An ideal statement piece for Seemantham or half-saree functions.
description: This exquisite Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities. The combination of precious gemstones and the South Sea pearl makes it a valuable and timeless heirloom. Experience the epitome of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The floral design represents prosperity and new beginnings, making it an auspicious piece.
